content: daedalus dk socks are knitted in the round cuff down with a heel flap and gusset or toe up with a shadow wrap heel the pattern is created using mosaic which involves slipping stitches it has no floats and uses only 1 colour per round **sizes** 1 2 3 4 **actual finished sock circumference ** 17 20 23 25 5 cm / 6 75 7 75 9 10 **to fit foot circumference ** 19 5 22 5 25 5 28 cm / 7 5 8 75 10 11 **yardage ** all yardage is approximated it will depend on your knitting gauge and the length of feet you are knitting for please use it only as a guide **mid-calf ** colour a 100 130 150 170 m / 110 143 165 186 yds colour b 85 104 115 125 m / 93 114 126 137 yds **shortie ** colour a 90 105 115 130 m / 100 115 126 143 yds colour b 45 56 65 78 m / 50 62 72 86 yds dk weight shown in coop knits socks yeah shades 225 sugilite 218 quartz mid calves 214 pigeon 222 prunus shorties
